SNACKBAR.MESSAGE_SUBMIT_SUCCESS: Message sent succesfully. We will be in touch very soon!
SNACKBAR.MESSAGE_SUBMIT_ERROR: An error occurred. Please, try again.

CONTACT_SECTION.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Together we can research ways and ideas that can massively improve the overall operating efficiency of your company.

CARD1.TITLE: Let's do a quick meeting?
CARD1.SUBTITLE: Choose a time that works for you.

CARD2.TITLE: Not ready for a call? Send us a message.
CARD2.SUBTITLE: We'll respond to you shortly, typically within a few hours.

CONTACT_FORM_INPUTS.MESSAGEPLACEHOLDER: How can we help? Fell free to share any details.

CARD1.TITLE: Stop Losing Data
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: Automatically capture every detail from projects, meetings, and proposals so historical pricing, win/loss reasons, and customer patterns are never lost again.

CARD2.TITLE: Turn Reports Into Action
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Centralize and analyze production, quality, and financial reports with AI that extracts insights you can act on. Move from unread documents to real, quantified improvement opportunities.

CARD3.TITLE: Bring Your Knowledge to Life
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: Transform your company's know-how into evolving, searchable intelligence. Our AI learns and improves with existing knowledge, so your processes get better with every project.

HERO_HEADLINE: Make every piece of knowledge work for you

FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE1: Automated data capture across projects, reports, and documents
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE1DESCRIPTION: Automatically collect and organize data from every project, report, and document—eliminating manual entry and ensuring consistent, up-to-date information across your entire workflow.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE2DESCRIPTION: Turn complex data into clear, actionable insights with AI-driven dashboards that highlight trends, flag risks, and support smarter, faster decision-making.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE3: Knowledge repository for process, pricing, and operational history
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE3DESCRIPTION: Centralize your organization's knowledge in one searchable hub—capturing processes, pricing models, and operational history so teams can work with clarity and confidence.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE4: Integrations with ERP and CRM systems
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE4DESCRIPTION: Connect seamlessly with your existing ERP and CRM platforms to unify workflows, reduce duplication, and maintain a single source of truth across the business.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE5DESCRIPTION: Enable distributed teams to work together in real time with enterprise-grade security, controlled access, and shared workspaces designed for cross-location collaboration.

HOW_TO.STEP1: 1. Connect your existing ERP or CRM and upload historical files
HOW_TO.STEP2: 2. If you don't have any kind of data, we help you obtain what is missing
HOW_TO.STEP3: 3. AI ingests and structures all past and current data
HOW_TO.STEP4: 4. Get dashboards, opportunities, and process insights instantly
HOW_TO.STEP5: 5. Let your AI learn all these insights and train your team so you can expand globally with confidence
